live_updates: Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
51461.summary: Some customers in the Chinatown/Downtown East Side area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
51461.title: Jul 10 - Vancouver (Chinatown/Downtown East Side) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
